general.content: Cohere Inc. specialises in enterprise-focused language AI solutions, founded by former Google Brain researchers in 2019. The company emphasises practical NLP applications for business use cases. Command R+ launched in EU markets on 15th April 2024 following comprehensive localisation efforts.

properties.content: Model architecture specifications not publicly disclosed.

distribution.content: Command R+ is exclusively available through Cohere's API platform with enterprise-grade SLAs and support. The proprietary distribution model ensures controlled access with comprehensive monitoring. Integration options include SDKs for major programming languages and cloud platforms.

use.content: Usage policy information not publicly available.
